findings.title: OTUT - Owner Transfer User's Tokens
findings.description: The contract owner can transfer a user's tokens to their own contract.

findings.title: ULTW - Unlimited Liquidity to Team Wallet
findings.description: The contract owner can transfer unlimited funds to the team wallet without limits.

findings.title: FSA - Fixed Swap Address
findings.description: The swap address is fixed and cannot be changed, making it difficult to adapt to future swaps.

findings.title: CO - Code Optimization
findings.description: Some code segments can be optimized for better performance.

findings.title: L01 - Public Function could be Declared External
findings.description: Public functions that are never called from the contract should be declared external to save gas.

findings.title: L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: Constant state variables should be declared constant to save gas.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The contract does not follow Solidity naming conventions.

findings.title: L05 - Unused State Variable
findings.description: There are unused state variables in the contract.
